title: Walk-In Closets, GE Stainless Steel Appliances
posting_body: Life at the Speed of Luxe!
Life At The Speed of Luxe begins and ends with G12, located in Downtown Los Angeles in the heart of the residential friendly South Park District.
G12 is just steps away from the Los Angeles Convention Center, Staples Center, and L.A. Live.
In addition to your entertainment needs G12 is conveniently located near some of the premiere restaurants, bars, grocery stores, shopping, movie theatres as well as Grand Hope Park.
There is something for everyone, and with a walk score of 94% and bike score of 81% everything is easily accessible from your home here at G12.
Use this link for more information:
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 699 Sq.
- Choice of Two Stylish Interior Packages
- 30 Distinctive Floor Plans and Two-Story Mezzanine Lofts
- 6th & 7th Floor Sky Terraces with DTLA Views
- Chic Lounge with Fireplace and Media Room
- Entertainment Kitchen with Community Dining Space
- Coffee Bar with TopBrewer App-Powered Espresso Machine
1200 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA, 90015
